ingredients.ingredient: 3 dried negro (pasilla) chile peppers, stemmed and seeded
¾ pound fresh tomatillos, husks removed
¾ pound Roma tomatoes, halved lengthwise
½ teaspoon chicken bouillon granules, or to taste

cookingTips: Toast the dried chiles lightly before boiling to deepen their flavor
Strain the sauce through a fine mesh for a smoother consistency
Simmer the sauce for 15 minutes to meld flavors before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What techniques can you use to balance the heat and depth of the pasilla chiles with the brightness of the tomatillos?
